name: Split Up (Drentsoft Games Ltd)
description:
You are a nuclear fission reactor! Try to balance your temperatures to avoid a melt down without stalling and the energy demands of the city.

It's not the most accurate simulator out there... it's not even really a simulator but it was quite fun making it.

Controls

Mouse: Aim neutrons

Left Click/Space: Shoot neutrons (hold to gain power)

A - Lower Left Control Rod - Lowers temperature

D - Lower Right Control Rod - Lowers temperature

The game is a little buggy, it's quite hard to do much past the first few collisions because the neutrons get in the way of each other. Some of the split atoms just lose energy and for some reason atoms just stopped spawning from the top half of the screen!
